briefTitle: LobularCard Trial: Searching for Novel Germline Mutations in Lobular Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: LobularCard Trial: Searching for Novel Germline Mutations in Lobular Breast Cancer Patients
conditions: Lobular Breast Carcinoma, Lobular in Situ Breast Carcinoma, BRCA1 Mutation, BRCA2 Mutation
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Relative frequency of patients with a germline mutation
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion criteria:

1. All LBC observed retrospectively at the European Institute of Oncology, with a proved diagnosis of LBC (biopsy or operated)
2. Patients with blood available in biobank Exclusion criteria

   * Patients with a previous cancer (except skin basal cell carcinoma)
   * Patients with ductal or mixed BC
